title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, General, Supervisory Procedure 101 - Notice of Automated Data Processing Systems: Superintendent's Right to Examine Independent Services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, General, Supervisory Procedure 101 - Notice of Automated Data Processing Systems: Superintendent's Right to Examine Independent Services

State Regulations
§ 101.1 - Notice
§ 101.2 - Superintendent's right of examination

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, General, Supervisory Procedure 101

12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
